meaningMnemonic: You know that 今 means now. What you probably don't know is that まで means "until." So, this word means <vocabulary>until now</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this word is the kun'yomi reading which you learned previously when you learned the vocab word 今. You can tell this is a kun'yomi reading because it has hiragana attached. So if you know that, you should be able to read this word as well.
